name: Block Breaker Prime
description:
Block Breaker Prime is a classical game which includes 50 stages. Every stage you'll get a little bit of twist than before. Very simple and easy but also challenging. 

What's New!!!!

  • Every time you play the game, you'll experience a new theme even you play the same stage, you'll get a little bit of difference than before.
  • 50 Unique stages but you'll never get bored because every time you start the game you'll find same level in different block orientation and theme.
